item.title: Back to Personal Agile
item.description: Life’s been kinda busy. Between family and work, hobbies take a back seat. The quote that applies is “A goal without a plan is just a wish”. So I want to make a plan. A goal without a plan is just a wish. In IT world, “Agile” is an invective. Rightfully so. I’ve never seen it properly implemented. Usually it’s a way to mask the lack of any process. “Oh we are agile”.
